# type

**Instance Property**

The tile set’s type.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: SKTileSetType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The tile set’s type specifies how the tiles in the set will be arranged when placed in a tile map.

## Accessing or Reading a Tile Set’s Properties

- **defaultTileGroup**: The tile set’s default tile group.
- **defaultTileSize**: The tile set’s default tile size.
- **name**: A name associated with the tile set.
- **tileGroups**: The tile set’s array of tile group objects.
- **SKTileSetType**: An enumeration defining how tiles are arranged.
